0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON REPORTS THAT OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS IN HONG KONG ARE BEING FORCED TO SLEEP IN TOILETS, TINY CUBBYHOLES, AND ON BALCONIES BY THEIR EMPLOYERS

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01004
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON REPORTS THAT OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS IN HONG KONG ARE BEING FORCED TO SLEEP IN TOILETS, TINY CUBBYHOLES, AND ON BALCONIES BY THEIR EMPLOYERS
